TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit GKAgentDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AgentDidUpdate (this GameplayKit.IGKAgentDelegate This, GameplayKit.GKAgent agent);
.method public static hidebysig void AgentDidUpdate(class GameplayKit.IGKAgentDelegate This, class GameplayKit.GKAgent agent) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: Method that is called after has performed a simulation step.

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: Method that is called before performs a simulation step.
